data.title: Kevin & Perry Go Large - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Kevin & Perry Go Large with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
2000

1 hr 22 mins

Comedy

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

In the feature-film debut for the familiar characters from the BBC's "The Harry Enfield Show," hormonally charged teenagers and DJ wannabes Kevin (co-screenwriter Enfield) and Perry (Kathy Burke) travel to a hedonistic Mediterranean vacation destination with dreams of losing their virginity and getting lost in the chaotic club scene.
